TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit EncoderParameter extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class EncoderParameter Implements IDisposable
public ref class EncoderParameter sealed : IDisposable

summary.span: 用于向图像编码器传递值或值数组。

span.span: Used to pass a value, or an array of values, to an image encoder.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你还可以使用对象以便接收受特定图像编码器某个特定参数的可能值的列表。You can also use an object to receive a list of possible values supported by a particular parameter of a particular image encoder. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建使用构造函数。The following code example demonstrates how to create a using the constructor. 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体和调用`VaryQualityLevel`从窗体的构造函数的方法。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form and call the `VaryQualityLevel` method from the form's constructor. 此示例需要名为的映像文件`TestPhoto.jpg`位于**c:\\**。This example requires an image file named `TestPhoto.jpg` located at **c:\\**. [!code-csharp[UsingImageEncodersDecoders#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/UsingImageEncodersDecoders/CS/Form1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[UsingImageEncodersDecoders#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/UsingImageEncodersDecoders/VB/Form1.vb#8)] [!code-csharp[UsingImageEncodersDecoders#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/UsingImageEncodersDecoders/CS/Form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[UsingImageEncodersDecoders#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/UsingImageEncodersDecoders/VB/Form1.vb#6)]
